lyric:
[00:01.350]It might seem crazy what I'm 'bout to say
[00:06.970]Sunshine she's here, you can take a break
[00:12.390]I'm a hot air balloon, I could go to space
[00:18.120]With the air like I don't care, baby, by the way
[00:23.740]Because I'm happy...
[00:26.090]Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof
[00:29.730]Because I'm happy...
[00:32.060]Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth
[00:35.740]Because I'm happy...
[00:37.980]Clap along if you know what happiness is to you
[00:41.660]Because I'm happy...
[00:44.110]Clap along if you feel like that's what you want to do
[00:49.230]Here comes bad news, talkin' this and that
[00:55.450]But give me all you've got, and don't hold it back
[01:01.020]Well, I should probably warn you, I'll be just fine
[01:07.590]No offense to you, don't waste your time, here's why...
[01:13.250]Because I'm happy...
[01:16.250]Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof
[01:19.830]Because I'm happy...
[01:22.370]Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth
[01:25.800]Because I'm happy...

[01:30.780]Because I'm happy...
[01:33.470]Clap along if you feel like that's what you want to do
[01:38.840]Bring me down... can't nothing...
[01:41.720]Bring me down... your level is too high...
[01:44.850]Bring me down... can't nothing...
[01:47.590]Bring me down, I said (let me tell you now)
[01:50.620]Bring me down... can't nothing...
[01:54.260]Bring me down... your level is too high...
[01:57.150]Bring me down... can't nothing...
[02:00.130]Bring me down, I said...

[02:45.470]Clap along if you feel like that's what you want to do
[02:53.440]Bring me down... can't nothing...
[02:56.080]Bring me down... your level is too high...
[02:59.070]Bring me down... can't nothing...
[03:02.300]Bring me down, I said
[03:03.740]Because I'm happy...

tlyric:
[by:已逝的过往]
[00:01.350]或许接下来我的话 会让你觉得很疯狂
[00:06.970]太阳先生 既然她在这里 你就去休息吧
[00:12.390]我这爱情热气球能够升上太空
[00:18.120]就这样升腾上天 其他的我也不想理会了
[00:23.740]因为我挺高兴
[00:26.090]就当这里没屋顶 掌声就给我震起来
[00:29.730]因为我好幸福
[00:32.060]要你也觉得幸福就是真谛 拍起来
[00:35.740]因为我超快乐
[00:37.980]要是你知道属于自己的幸福为何 拍吧
[00:41.660]因为我狠幸福
[00:44.110]要是你也想投身进来 何不快点拍起来
[00:49.230]那些噩耗总是如影随形
[00:55.450]别藏着了 跟我说说你听到的呗
[01:01.020]好吧 我应该提醒你船到桥头自然直
[01:07.590]这是我的温馨提示：时不待人哟
[01:13.250]因为我挺高兴
[01:16.250]就当这里没屋顶 掌声就给我震起来
[01:19.830]因为我好幸福
[01:22.370]要你也觉得幸福就是真谛 拍起来
[01:25.800]因为我超快乐
[01:27.790]要是你知道属于自己的幸福为何 拍吧
[01:30.780]因为我狠幸福
[01:33.470]要是你也想投身进来 何不快点拍起来
[01:38.840]阻止我幸福吗 那种玩意还没出现呢
[01:41.720]只有你热情洋溢的爱意会让我消沉
[01:44.850]所以说 什么都不能阻止我幸福
[01:47.590]我说过了
